# LIBRARIES
```{r}
library(tidyverse) ; library(ggplot2)



```

# LOAD DATA
```{r}
unclean_all <- read.csv('tok_ds_all.csv')
clean_all <- read.csv('tok_ds_clean.csv')
#unclean_25k <- read.csv('')
#clean_25k <- read.csv('')
```


# PLOTS

Histograms
```{r}
# Tokenised text and sum lengths
ggplot(unclean_all, aes(x=tok_sum_len)) +
  geom_histogram()


# unclean all
ggplot(unclean_all, aes(tok_sum_len)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=60,color = "#000000", fill = "#0099F8") +
  labs(
    title = "Unclean all tok_sum_len",
    subtitle = "Made by Ida",
    caption = "Source: DaNewsroom blabla",
    x = "Tok sum len",
    y = "Count"
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "#0099F8", size = 16, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold"),
    plot.caption = element_text(face = "italic")
  )

# clean all
ggplot(clean_all, aes(tok_sum_len)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=60,color = "#000000", fill = "#0099F8") +
  labs(
    title = "Clean all tok_sum_len",
    subtitle = "Made by Ida",
    caption = "Source: DaNewsroom blabla",
    x = "Tok sum len",
    y = "Count"
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "#0099F8", size = 16, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold"),
    plot.caption = element_text(face = "italic")
  )



ggplot(clean_all, aes(x=tok_sum_len)) +
  geom_histogram()


ggplot(unclean_all, aes(x=tok_text_len)) +
  geom_histogram()

ggplot(clean_all, aes(x=tok_text_len)) +
  geom_histogram()


```
